passages.text:
You wake up on a damp bedroll in a similarly damp dungeon. You are behind bars, arrested for treason by a tyrannical ruler. You've been here for a long time, and you have begun to fear that you won't live to see the light of day again.
[[Time to escape->Cell]]
passages.name: Dungeon Start

passages.text:
You are in your cell. The door to your cage is on the right side of the bars. If you could just open that door, you're sure you could escape! Your bedroll is positioned in one corner of the room, and there is a grate on the side opposite from it.
[[Examine Door->Door]]
[[Examine Bedroll->Bedroll]]
[[Examine Grate->Grate]]
passages.name: Cell

passages.text:
This is the bedroll that you've grown used to. When you first got here it was uncomfortable, but not so much anymore. When you lay on it you feel a poking on your lower back.
[[Rip open bedroll->File]]
[[Back->Cell]]
passages.name: Bedroll

passages.text:
This is the drainage grate for your cell. Looking down it, you think you see somethjing shiny, but you have no way of getting to it with the grate in the way.
[[Back->Cell]]
passages.name: Grate

passages.text:
Upon ripping open your bedroll, you find what looks like a nail file. Perhaps some previous prisoner stashed it here. You take it and continue looking around.
[[Back->Cell2]]
passages.name: File

passages.text:
You are in your cell. The door to your cage is on the right side of the bars. If you could just open that door, you're sure you could escape! Your destroyed bedroll is positioned in one corner of the room, and there is a grate on the side opposite from it.
[[Examine Door->Door2]]
[[Examine Bedroll->Bedroll2]]
[[Examine Grate->Grate2]]
passages.name: Cell2

passages.text:
Your bedroll is destroyed. If you don't find a way out, tonight will be long and restless.
[[Back->Cell2]]
passages.name: Bedroll2

passages.text:
This is the drainage grate for your cell. Looking down it, you think you see somethjing shiny, but you have no way of getting to it with the grate in the way. Perhaps you could use the file to remove the bars.
[[Use file->Drain]]
[[Back->Cell2]]
passages.name: Grate2

passages.text:
It takes a long time to file through the bars of the grate, and you're worried that a guard will see you passing by. No guards come, however, and you romve the grate. Reaching your arm in, you find a key. Perhaps it fell off a guard's key ring while they were fetching a previous prisoner.
[[Back->Cell3]]
passages.name: Drain

passages.text:
You are in your cell. The door to your cage is on the right side of the bars. If you could just open that door, you're sure you could escape! Your bedroll is positioned in one corner of the room, and there is an open grate on the side opposite from it.
[[Examine Door->Door3]]
[[Examine Bedroll->Bedroll3]]
[[Examine Grate->Grate3]]
passages.name: Cell3

passages.text:
Yup, definitely still locked, but maybe it won't be for long...
[[Use key->Escape]]
[[Back->Cell3]]
passages.name: Door3

passages.text:
Your bedroll is destroyed. If you don't find a way out, tonight will be long and restless.
[[Back->Cell3]]
passages.name: Bedroll3

passages.text:
The grate is cut through. If a guard were to stop by, they would surely notice it and punish you.
[[Back->Cell3]]
passages.name: Grate3

passages.text: With a soft click, the door to your cell swings open. Congratulations, you are free!
passages.name: Escape
